metadata.title: CVE-2018-20361 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An invalid memory address dereference was discovered in the hf_assembly function of libfaad/sbr_hfadj.c in Freeware Advanced Audio Decoder 2 (FAAD2) 2.8.8. The vulnerability causes a segmentation fault and application crash, which leads to denial of service.

criterions.comment: faad2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.8-3.2').
